title: 2007: YEAR in REVIEW
body_text:
It's hard to believe 2007 is coming to a close. Seems like it just zipped on by doesn't it? The
Dark Days
under the lamppost, the few "blinded by the white" in the
CREAMation
match-ups, multiple pinky finger injuries, and of course the summer centinnial - it's impossible to forget 2007!
Season 8 (January 6 to March 17)
DODGEBALL 71
An astounding 39 participants eagerly await to get it on at the year's inaugural showdown.
DODGEBALL 74
An all-painball melee in preparation for the Toms River Tournament.
DODGEBALL 75
In the first-ever
PickYourPoision Rules
encounter, Chris Adams knocks off Lenny Herrera in Herrera's return event. The catching machine award winner was a last minute substitute for one Kevin Fitzpatrick.
DODGEBALL 78
Lauren Stopa ushers in the "birthday bash", throwing a surprise party for her legendary boyfriend, Justin Pierce.
DODGEBALL 80
Mike Edwards ends Kevin Megill's undefeated streak at the intense season finale.
Season 9 (March 24 to June 2)
DODGEBALL LXXXI
John Tronolone and Lenny Herrera are
CREAMated
at the hands of Valerie Winston and Kevin Adams.
DODGEBALL 85
Mike "Sputz" Krott and Lenny Herrera celebrate their birthdays in "God-like" fashion.
DODGEBALL 87
Liz Nogueira slashes her younger sister Kathryn 10 to 0.
DODGEBALL 88
The last event held on the front courts of Wall High School. In the main event, Mike Edwards remains unbeaten taking out Mike Butler.
DODGEBALL 90
Season 1 icons Justin Pierce and Tom Adams take center stage on a beautiful spring day.
Season 10 (June 9 to August 18)
DODGEBALL 92
The turmoil that was "Quadruple Birthday"!
DODGEBALL 93
Team WALL conquers the outnumbering Team ALL in the first of four brutal battles.
DODGEBALL 95
The impatiently awaited
Megill vs. Edwards II
ends in a 2-2 tie.
DODGEBALL 96
Rob Avakian clashes with
Hit the Human
contest winner Juan Londono in the first of several meetings between the two.
DODGEBALL 100
Six iconic captains, a special 50/50 raffle, the
OH Tracks!
soundtrack - simply put, the greatest of all-time.
Season 11 (August 25 to November 3)
DODGEBALL 101
"It all began again" with the introduction of the
Dodgeball Draft
.
DODGEBALL 102
The milestone Two Year Anniversary event, headlined by Lauren Stopa, Valerie Winston, Lauren Winston, and Diana DiBuccio.
DODGEBALL CVII
Team ALL does the near impossible, upsetting Team WALL, 5 to 4.
DODGEBALL 108
The
Draft
and
BoxBall
on the same night. Indeed it was a "Masterpiece of Mayhem".
DODGEBALL CX
The two most destructive couples perhaps in the game's history square off when Michael Butler and Alison Bertsch turn back the challenge of Mike "Sputz" Krott and Melissa Kerr.
Season 12 (November 10 to Present)
DODGEBALL CX1
Opening things up with the LXXXVI rematch between Kevin Adams and Grant Cornero.
DODGEBALL 114
Experience falters when Valerie Winston loses to Pam D'Luhy.
DODGEBALL CXV
"The War to Settle the Scores" when Fitzpatrick, Londono, and Marzarella prevail against rivals C. Adams, Avakian, and Basista.
DODGEBALL ONE-SEVENTEEN
Tom Adams narrowly defeats John Tronolone at the 2nd Annual Christmas Special.
.................
DODGEBALL 118 (Friday, December 28)
The inmates are running the asylum on this first of two consecutive action-packed nights. The first Friday event since DODGEBALL 50 and who in the hell knows what to expect. Can you say "Trial and Error?"
DODGEBALL 119 (Saturday, December 29)
Better be prepared both mentally and physically as the powerful southpaw
Kevin Megill
challenges blocking magician
Justin Wolf
to conclude this unforgettable 12 months!
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
This is what it's about right here. In the mega-main event,
Ryan Letsche
collides with
Grant Cornero
for all the marbles! Plus, don't forget about the
Gold Awards
trophy presentation as well as the special 50/50 Raffle! Never-before-seen decorations, a red hot CXX soundtrack and so much more at the one and only Season 12 Finale on January 5, 2008!

It's hard to believe 2007 is coming to a close. Seems like it just zipped on by doesn't it? The Dark Days under the lamppost, the few "blinded by the white" in the CREAMation match-ups, multiple pinky finger injuries, and of course the summer centinnial - it's impossible to forget 2007!

Season 8 (January 6 to March 17)
DODGEBALL 71
An astounding 39 participants eagerly await to get it on at the year's inaugural showdown.
DODGEBALL 74
An all-painball melee in preparation for the Toms River Tournament.
DODGEBALL 75
In the first-ever PickYourPoision Rules encounter, Chris Adams knocks off Lenny Herrera in Herrera's return event. The catching machine award winner was a last minute substitute for one Kevin Fitzpatrick.
DODGEBALL 78
Lauren Stopa ushers in the "birthday bash", throwing a surprise party for her legendary boyfriend, Justin Pierce.
DODGEBALL 80
Mike Edwards ends Kevin Megill's undefeated streak at the intense season finale.

Season 9 (March 24 to June 2)
DODGEBALL LXXXI
John Tronolone and Lenny Herrera are CREAMated at the hands of Valerie Winston and Kevin Adams.
DODGEBALL 85
Mike "Sputz" Krott and Lenny Herrera celebrate their birthdays in "God-like" fashion.
DODGEBALL 87
Liz Nogueira slashes her younger sister Kathryn 10 to 0.
DODGEBALL 88
The last event held on the front courts of Wall High School. In the main event, Mike Edwards remains unbeaten taking out Mike Butler.
DODGEBALL 90
Season 1 icons Justin Pierce and Tom Adams take center stage on a beautiful spring day.

Season 10 (June 9 to August 18)
DODGEBALL 92
The turmoil that was "Quadruple Birthday"!
DODGEBALL 93
Team WALL conquers the outnumbering Team ALL in the first of four brutal battles.
DODGEBALL 95
The impatiently awaited Megill vs. Edwards II ends in a 2-2 tie.
DODGEBALL 96
Rob Avakian clashes with Hit the Human contest winner Juan Londono in the first of several meetings between the two.
DODGEBALL 100
Six iconic captains, a special 50/50 raffle, the OH Tracks! soundtrack - simply put, the greatest of all-time.

Season 11 (August 25 to November 3)
DODGEBALL 101
"It all began again" with the introduction of the Dodgeball Draft.
DODGEBALL 102
The milestone Two Year Anniversary event, headlined by Lauren Stopa, Valerie Winston, Lauren Winston, and Diana DiBuccio.
DODGEBALL CVII
Team ALL does the near impossible, upsetting Team WALL, 5 to 4.
DODGEBALL 108
The Draft and BoxBall on the same night. Indeed it was a "Masterpiece of Mayhem".
DODGEBALL CX
The two most destructive couples perhaps in the game's history square off when Michael Butler and Alison Bertsch turn back the challenge of Mike "Sputz" Krott and Melissa Kerr.

Season 12 (November 10 to Present)
DODGEBALL CX1
Opening things up with the LXXXVI rematch between Kevin Adams and Grant Cornero.
DODGEBALL 114
Experience falters when Valerie Winston loses to Pam D'Luhy.
DODGEBALL CXV
"The War to Settle the Scores" when Fitzpatrick, Londono, and Marzarella prevail against rivals C. Adams, Avakian, and Basista.
DODGEBALL ONE-SEVENTEEN
Tom Adams narrowly defeats John Tronolone at the 2nd Annual Christmas Special.

.................

DODGEBALL 118 (Friday, December 28)
The inmates are running the asylum on this first of two consecutive action-packed nights. The first Friday event since DODGEBALL 50 and who in the hell knows what to expect. Can you say "Trial and Error?"

DODGEBALL 119 (Saturday, December 29)
Better be prepared both mentally and physically as the powerful southpaw Kevin Megill challenges blocking magician Justin Wolf to conclude this unforgettable 12 months!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


This is what it's about right here. In the mega-main event, Ryan Letsche collides with Grant Cornero for all the marbles! Plus, don't forget about the Gold Awards trophy presentation as well as the special 50/50 Raffle! Never-before-seen decorations, a red hot CXX soundtrack and so much more at the one and only Season 12 Finale on January 5, 2008!
